titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Committee of Estates the humble remonstrance of the commissioners of the Generall Assembly, met at Edinburgh the 13 of October, 1647
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
Ker, A.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
